translations: n.告发，检举；公开谴责，斥责

phrs.translation: 谴责, 指责, 告发, 斥责
单方面废除, 片面废止, 片面废约
翻译, 不准侵入住宅, 不准侵入住宅英语

sentences.sentence: All parties joined in bitter denunciation of the terrorists.
sentences.translation: 所有党派同仇敌忾地痛斥恐怖主义者。

sentences.sentence: On September 24, he wrote a stinging denunciation of his critics.
sentences.translation: 9月24号，他写了一篇针对他的批评者的言辞犀利的谴责书。

sentences.sentence: His speech is a head-on denunciation of the unpopular new policy.
sentences.translation: 他的发言是对不得人心的新政策的迎头痛斥。
